tiles.title: TV Guide
tiles.synopsis: Browse all the channels and see what's on over the next seven days.

tiles.title: Planner
tiles.synopsis: Find all the TV shows and movies you've recorded or downloaded.

tiles.title: Catch Up TV
tiles.synopsis: Catch up on shows you've missed from up to the last 30 days.

tiles.title: TV Box Sets
tiles.synopsis: Watch entire series of the latest and greatest shows whenever you want.

tiles.title: New & Recommended
tiles.synopsis: Search for new entertainment series and catch up from the start.

tiles.title: Sports
tiles.synopsis: Watch the latest live sports with the best commentary

tiles.title: Sky Movies On Demand
tiles.synopsis: Enjoy hundreds of movies on demand, including the latest premieres.

tiles.title: Sky Store
tiles.synopsis: Find a wide choice of movies to rent or buy, from blockbusters to classics.
